roleset.name: make anew
roleset.note: REGENERATE-V NOTES: Might take additional args (start state, eg) but the corpus isn'tforthcoming with examples. (from regenerate.01-v)

example.name: hustings?
example.text: ``What I'd like to see, if he is up to it, is for Reagan-1 to take to the hustings *trace*-1 to regenerate enthusiasm for SDI,'' the congressman says.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: And it is no accident that Blake's regeneration of Urizen appears simultaneously with the new character of the Spectre, for these two prominent innovations in Blake's myth are profoundly linked.
